title: rhomelmabini
author: rhomelmabini
content: As you all know, Vitalik and his co-authors published this document regarding Soulbond tokens and it's potential to be the next frontier of social relationship of trust. I know this won't make you money since it's not transferrable to anyone else but if we're talking about achievements to prove your worthiness about a specific craft, this one will might be your friend in the digital world or web3 and so on and so forth. What do y'all think about this and what's your interest regarding Soulbond or it's greatest potential?

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Bump.Here's a twitter thread for you to understand Soulbond in a much easier way and pastry really break it down so that folks who aren't that technically knowledgeable on the topic can understand. https://twitter.com/PastryEth/status/1529130859814600705?t=ADM4FwyBQ_j_q3VQH-n8xw&s=19You can retweet it if you like and to raise awareness to the future of Soulbond and the technology that it may bring in the world of Web3.
